mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnAreply (qnaIndexId, qnaContent, inserted, writerId) VALUES (#{qnaIndexId}, #{qnaContent}, #{inserted}, #{writerId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.qnaIndexId, r.qnacontent, r.inserted, r.writerId, IF(q.qnaIndexId = #{qnaContent}, 1, 0) own FROM QnAreply r JOIN QnA q ON r.qnaContent = q.qnaIndexId WHERE r.writerId = #{writerId} ORDER BY r.qnaIndexId
SELECT qnaIndexId, qnaContent, inserted, writerId FROM QnAreply WHERE qnaIndexId = #{qnaIndexId}
